dynSentence.name: QRY_CMMTOPLG
dynSentence.sentence: SELECT SYS_DT,SYS_TM,CONVERT(JRN_NO,CHAR) JRN_NO,AC_DT,OPR_PROV,OPR_CITY,OPR_DEPT,OPR_ID,TX_CD,TXN_NM,IP_ADDR FROM CMMTOPLG PLG LEFT JOIN CMMTTXIF TXNIF ON TX_CD = TXN_COD WHERE (TRIM('%s') IS NULL OR SYS_DT >='%s') AND (OPR_ID LIKE '%%s%' OR TRIM('%s') IS NULL) AND (TRIM('%s') IS NULL OR SYS_DT <='%s') AND (JRN_NO LIKE '%%s%' OR TRIM('%s') IS NULL) ORDER BY JRN_NO desc

dynSentence.name: QRY_CMMTDEPT_DETAIL
dynSentence.sentence: SELECT CONCAT((PROV_LVL+1),PROV_CD,'000','0000') ORG_CD,PROV_LNM ORG_NM,CONCAT((PROV_LVL+1),' ') ORG_LVL,' ' UORG_NO,' ' ADR,' ' POST_NO,' ' LINK_NM,' ' TEL,VGOP_PROV ARE_CD FROM CMMTPCOP UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT('3',PROV_CD,CITY_CD,'0000') ORG_CD,CITY_LNM ORG_NM,'3' ORG_LVL,(SELECT CONCAT((CMMTPCOP.PROV_LVL+1),CMMTPCOP.PROV_CD,'000','0000') FROM CMMTPCOP WHERE CMMTPCOP.PROV_CD = A.PROV_CD) UORG_NO,' ' ADR,' ' POST_NO,' ' LINK_NM,' ' TEL,CITY_CD ARE_CD FROM CMMTCCOP A
